actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Nutrition and Investigations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to temporarily prohibit the use of funds to carry out the WIC-Child Impact Study or a similar study, to direct that any savings be used for supplemental foods and related costs for nutrition services and administration under the WIC program, and for other purposes.
subjects: Federal aid to maternal health services

summary.text: Amends provisions of the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 relating to the special supplemental food program for women, infants, and children (WIC program) to prohibit program funds from being used to carry out the WIC-Child Impact Study or a similar study. Requires an amount equal to the amount that would otherwise have been expended to carry out such a study to be made available for supplemental foods and related costs for nutrition services and administration.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to temporarily prohibit the use of funds to carry out the WIC-Child Impact Study or a similar study, to direct that any savings be used for supplemental foods and related costs for nutrition services and administration under the WIC program, and for other purposes.
